subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Steroids
Testosterone
Doping
lead_paragraph: The silver and bronze medalists in the hammer throw at the Beijing Olympics are being investigated for doping offenses by the International Olympic Committee. The medalists, Vadim Devyatovskiy and Ivan Tsikhan, both of Belarus, tested positive for traces of testosterone after the final on Aug. 17, the Russian news agency Allsport said. An I.O.C. disciplinary commission will meet at the end of the month to hear the case, an I.O.C. spokeswoman said.
